name: Cyborg Pigeon
description:
Pigeons Strike Back With A Secret Weapon...

The year is 2047.  You are a cybernetically engineered super pigeon and your mission, should you choose to peck at it, is to save as many pigeons as possible... Good luck

Team:

Raniero Lara-Garduno - Programming

Josh Cherian - Programming

Blake Williford - Art, Sound, Programming
